review: I decided to buy this because I can no longer watch youtube on my bluray player. I should have bought it a long time ago because it is WAY faster and more reliable than the bluray. Very large selection of apps available. As other reviewers have said, it would be nice to have the ability to use the voice search within apps like netflix, or to be able to voice search only within Prime movies rather than all Amazon movies.
author: M. Hays

review: Order came in as expected. Everything was packaged as it should be. I was able to download Netflix, Hulu Plus and Sling TV. All run with no issues. When I had a problem with streaming video a couple of month later the customer sever line was quick and they were very helpful. And all that was wrong was a lose wire. It worked just like new. I love Amazon.
author: Angelique Cordeau
